QuestData.Title: Nuke 'Em Norbit
QuestData.Description:
These motospiders continue to multiply unchecked. If we don't slow them down they'll overrun Rustbolt soon.
I've modified Norbit here with adequate firepower to take the spiders head on!
Would you pilot Norbit and destroy the Reinforced Sparkweave Eggs?

Objectives.Objective: Reinforced Sparkweave Eggs destroyed with Scrap Bomb
